table.name: vtiger_bankguaranteeextensions
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_bankguaranteeextensions` ( `bankguaranteeextensionsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `bg_ext_startdate` DATE DEFAULT NULL, `bg_ext_enddate` DATE DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bankguaranteeextensionsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bankguaranteeextensionscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_bankguaranteeextensionscf` ( `bankguaranteeextensionsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bankguaranteeextensionsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
